hero.title: Sell your car with
hero.subtitle: Get a free, no-obligation offer for your car!

how it works.title: How It Works?
how it works.subtitle: Sell your car in 3 easy steps

step1.title: 1. Advertise your car
step1.subtitle: Fill out the online form and receive a free, no-obligation offer for your car.

step2.title: 2. Receive your offer
step2.subtitle: We will contact you to arrange an appointment to inspect your car.

step3.title: 3. Sell your car
step3.subtitle: We pay you immediately in cash or by bank transfer.

about us.title: About us
about us.subtitle: We are a team of car enthusiasts who decided to venture into buying and selling used cars. We are based in Paris and buy cars throughout France.

contact us.title: Contact us
contact us.subtitle: Do you have any questions? Do you want to meet us? Feel free to contact us!
